alert.note: Alert for Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:42PM CDT until June 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WOODFORD COUNTY... At 942 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Secor, or 10 miles east of Eureka, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... El Paso. This includes Interstate 39 between mile markers 10 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
